title: Stunning Diamond & Gemstone Peacock Haaram - A Royal Telugu Bridal Treasure
materials: Pink Quartz/Manikya stone (105.65 carats). Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A magnificent two-layered haaram, exquisitely handcrafted with intricate diamond detailing. Features traditional South Indian 'peacock' motifs symbolizing grace and prosperity. The lower layer features a grand pendant with a central Emerald, surrounded by diamonds and delicate pink quartz drops. The pendant also shows detailed filigree work. This is an exquisite example of traditional Telugu craftsmanship.
colors: and soft pink quartz creating a luxurious and visually captivating palette.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. Makes a statement at high-profile social events.
description: This heirloom-worthy haaram embodies timeless elegance and cultural significance. Its exceptional craftsmanship, the brilliance of the diamonds, and the vibrant gemstones make it a truly unique and valuable piece. The peacock motif is a symbol of beauty and good fortune, making it a cherished possession for generations. A valuable investment and a stunning statement of South Indian heritage.
